item.title: Special Help
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

Heres how I have mine setup and I never run out fo energy[code]}

public void DragonDagger(){
if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1215) {
if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 0)
if (spec >= 2) {
hitDiff = 12;
inCombat();
staticAnimation(252, absX, absY, 100);
setAnimation(1068);
actionTimer = 25;
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;
spec -= 2; // Specs - By Sam Server
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more special energy to do that.”); // Specs - Sam Server
}
} else {
sendMessage(“You Are Not Weilding A Dragon Dagger”);
}

}[/code]
And… case 161: // cry emote sendQuest("D dag", 182); DragonDagger(); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Special Help
item.dc:creator: @Ryu870 Ryu870
item.description:
@Ryu870 wrote:

My spec is like this for my Dragon dagger… [code]
case 162: //Dragon Dagger Special

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1215){
boolean GoOn = false;
if (specBar >= 12){
startAnimation(402);
stillgfx(306, absY, absX);
string4UpdateRequired = false;
specBar = 10;
abc = getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]);
cba = abc / 10;
abc2 = cba * 2;
if (abc2 <= 1) {
abc2 = 2;
}
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[2]+"", 4006);
deleteItem(161, GetItemSlot(161), 1);
updateRequired = false;
appearanceUpdateRequired = false;
GoOn = true;
}

	}	
	break;

[/code]

I want to be able to use it again but it doesn’t let you… It takes me down to 10 bars and I have to wait for it to go back up to 12 to use again… How can I make it to where I can use the special until all the bars are gone?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 01, 2006, 12:00:42 PM[/size][hr]|3 U //\ |D

Read full topic
